oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Midge, Boob, and Shrimp
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Shourek, Edward J.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hill District (Pittsburgh, Pa.)
Public schools--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
Central High School (Pittsburgh, Pa.)

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A view of three young men; Midge, Boob, and Shrimp posed outside the ventilator of Central High School in 1914.
